channel.title: How would i do This?
channel.description: So on my server there is an diffrent id for every close button so insted of adding it all in clickingButtons how would i make a file where there is a list and when one of them buttons in that list is clicked on it closes the interface i have open

item.title: How would i do This?
item.dc:creator: @TheIronDoorProject TheIronDoorProject
item.description:
@TheIronDoorProject wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:528778”] case 1: case 2: case 3: case 4: closeInterface(); break;
???[/quote]

It wa something like int[] ids = {1, 2 ,3 ,4 ,5 ,6 ,7 ,50}; i was looking for but thanaks

item.title: How would i do This?
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

	int[] ids = {1, 2 ,3 ,4 ,5 ,6 ,7 ,50};

		for(int i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
			if(ids[i] == CLICKINGBUTTONID) {
				closeInterface(CLICKINGBUTTONID);
			}
		}

I still think its pointless to loop while in a loop.

Read full topic
